status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dvg8j","text":"To purify SRC (WT or Y530F), we purchased gene-synthesized codon-optimized Src-TEV-GST in a pFastBac-Dual vector from Genscript (available from Addgene) for expression in insect cells. Use the constructs to generate bacmid DNA, using the Bac-to-Bac system, by amplification in DH10BacY cells 25. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9mdbb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bvf21","text":"After the bacmid DNA was verified by PCR for insertion of the transgene, purify bacmid DNA for transfection into Sf9 insect cells (12659017, Thermo Fisher, RRID:CVCL_0549). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bofad","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9sp6c","text":"To this end, mix   of plasmid DNA with FuGene transfection reagent (Promega) and transfect and seed 1 million Sf9 cells in a 6 well plate. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":17,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2l5nv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2500","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":8}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ap1t3","text":"About 7 days after transfection, harvest the V0 virus and use to infect   of 1 million cells per ml of Sf9 cells. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":72,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8cnej","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"40","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7en4e","text":"Closely monitor the viability of the cultures and upon the decrease in viability and confirmation of yellow fluorescence, collect the supernatant after centrifugation and store this as V1 virus. For expressions, infect   of Sf9 cells, at 1 million cells per ml, with   of V1 virus. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":219,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":267,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9kamn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":3}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}
